name: Plant Donor
description:
Welcome to your farm, plant donor! You must plant seeds in order to grow organs and sell them on the Black Market. Make sure to harvest your plant before its time is up!

Be careful! Pesky ghosts will try to suck the life out of your plants. Watch out for unwanted pests and keep your farm alive and well! Lose all your assets and its game over!

This game was created in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 52.
